main event: On July 10, 1953, a bright round object was sighted in Forrest City, Arkansas, appearing to hover at a high altitude before disappearing in a southeasterly direction.
interesting points: The object was described as silver-colored and very bright with no visible means of propulsion., Witnesses reported seeing the object for approximately 30-45 minutes., The observation occurred under clear weather conditions., Multiple witnesses included military personnel stationed in the area., The sighting was part of an official UFO investigation by Project Blue Book.
